trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hoplite has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hoplite's allies is within 5 feet of the hoplite and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hoplite makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.
